rows.label: tlk4140002801_msg0001
rows.name:
You helped us back then... Thank
you. Thanks to you, Norman-san and
I were able to come to Superbia.

rows.label: tlk4140002801_msg0002
rows.name:
As for my father... I've
left home now, so I've decided
not to think about it.

rows.label: tlk4140002801_msg0003
rows.name:
I feel bad for making my
mother feel lonely, though...

rows.label: tlk4140002801_msg0004
rows.name:
But I'm very happy now! It's an
unfamiliar land, but with Norman-san
here, I'm not afraid of anything.
